# Q1. 
## 정규분포 PDF 값을 계산하는 자신만의 함수 정의 및 정규분포 MU=3, SIGMA=2의 PDF 그리기

::: {#e5d94bcc .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
from scipy.stats import bernoulli
from scipy.stats import binom
from scipy.stats import norm
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt


import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import math 

def pdf(x, mu, sig):
    a = 1 / (sig * np.sqrt(2 * np.pi))
    b = np.exp((-0.5 * ((x - mu) / sig)) ** 2 )
    return a ** b 

k=np.linspace(-2, 8, 100)
y=norm.pdf(k, loc=3, scale=2)

plt.plot(k, y, color="black")
plt.show()
plt.clf()

```

:::

# Q2. 
## 파이썬 SCIPY 패키지 활용하여 다음 확률 구하기
# X ~ N(2, 3^2)

# 1) P(X < 3)

::: {#071ddc97 .cell execution_count=2}
``` {.python .cell-code}
norm.cdf(3, loc=2, scale=3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=2}
```
np.float64(0.6305586598182363)
```
:::
:::


# 2) P(2 < X < 5)

::: {#d9c6794c .cell execution_count=3}
``` {.python .cell-code}
norm.cdf(5, loc=2, scale=3) - norm.cdf(2, loc=2, scale=3)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=3}
```
np.float64(0.3413447460685429)
```
:::
:::


# 3) P(X < 3 or X > 7)

::: {#2aba4161 .cell execution_count=4}
``` {.python .cell-code}
a = norm.cdf(3, loc=0, scale=1)
b = 1 - norm.cdf(7, loc=0, scale=1) 
```
:::


## a값

::: {#2c3f20f9 .cell execution_count=5}
``` {.python .cell-code}
a = norm.cdf(3, loc=0, scale=1)
a
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=5}
```
np.float64(0.9986501019683699)
```
:::
:::


## b값

::: {#599c1ff9 .cell execution_count=6}
``` {.python .cell-code}
b = 1 - norm.cdf(7, loc=0, scale=1) 
b
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=6}
```
np.float64(1.2798651027878805e-12)
```
:::
:::


# Q3. 
## LS 빅데이터 스쿨 학생들의 중간고사 점수는 평균이 30이고, 분산이 4인 정규분포를 따른다.
## 상위 5%에 해당하는 학생의 점수는?

::: {#76f1f51d .cell execution_count=7}
``` {.python .cell-code}
norm.ppf(0.95, loc=30, scale=4)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-display execution_count=7}
```
np.float64(36.579414507805886)
```
:::
:::
